Recommendations: 1. If the budget warrants, an available safe drinking water facility be installed in the College of Engineering for the consumption of the students, faculty and staff.
2. The Administration may secure Occupancy permit for the COE Building.
3. Installation of Fire Detection and Alarm System may be installed to buildings. Availability of functional fire extinguisher in every laboratory room is recommended.
4. Proper and good housekeeping may be observed in the working and preparation area of the canteen or cafeteria.
5. It is recommended that the Task force may substantiate each benchmark statement with relevant and updated documents.
